title: Week 9 – Unit 9 (Only a Game?): wishes/regrets + should have + over-/under-
targets: Vocabulary: 20–24 كلمة عن الرياضة/المسابقات + البوادئ over-/under-
Grammar: I wish + Past Simple (تمنٍ حاضر) / I wish + Past Perfect (ندم على الماضي) / should (not) have + V3 (لوم/نصيحة بعدية)
Reading: فكرة عامة + تفاصيل + مرجع ضمير/مرادف
Listening: استماع موجّه لتعليق مدرّب بعد مباراة
Writing: Match Report + Reflection (6–8 جمل) يدمج أهداف القواعد

vocabulary.ex: The team underperformed in the first half.
The match ended in a draw.

grammar.title: I wish + Past Simple / Could
grammar.form: I wish I had more time. / I wish we could practise more.

grammar.title: I wish + Past Perfect
grammar.when: ندم على الماضي/تمنٍّ أن شيئًا لم يحدث أو حدث بشكل مختلف
grammar.form: I wish we had passed earlier. / I wish I had trained harder.

grammar.title: should (not) have + V3
grammar.form: We should have practised more. / He shouldn’t have argued.

grammar.title: over- / under- prefixes
grammar.when: معاني: إفراط/أكثر من اللازم (over-) / أقل من اللازم (under-)
grammar.form: overconfident / overestimate / overuse | underestimate / underperform / underpaid

grammarPractice.q: I wish I ___ (have) more time now.
I wish we ___ (win) the match yesterday.
I wish + Past Perfect يُستخدم لندم على الماضي.
The team ______ (underperform) in the first half.

reading.pre: توقّع: لماذا يخسر فريق قوي مباراة أحيانًا؟ ما دور الثقة الزائدة/الاستهانة؟
reading.text: Our school team was overconfident at the start of the final. We scored early, but then we underestimated the opponent. They made a quick comeback and we underperformed in defence. After the match, the coach said we should have passed the ball earlier and stayed calm. I wish we had respected the other team more. Still, we learned an important lesson about teamwork and fair play.

tasks.q: The main idea is that the team:
choices: won easily because they were overconfident
lost and learned from their mistakes

tasks.q: They underestimated the opponent after scoring early.
The phrase 'we underperformed in defence' means:
choices: we did not play at all

tasks.q: The coach says the team should have passed earlier.

writing.prompt: اكتب تقريرًا 6–8 جمل عن مباراة/مسابقة: اذكر النتيجة بإيجاز، ثم جملة I wish (حاضر أو ماضٍ) وجملة should/shouldn’t have + V3، واستخدم كلمة واحدة على الأقل ببادئة over-/under-.
tips: Use I wish + Past Simple for now: I wish I were/was fitter.
Use I wish + Past Perfect for past regret: I wish we had passed sooner.
Use should/shouldn’t have + V3: We should have practised more.
Add over-/under- word: overconfident / underestimate / underperform.

items.q: I wish I ___ (be) taller for basketball.
He ___ (not / waste) time arguing with the referee.
I wish + Past Simple يُعبّر عن تمنٍّ لحاضر مختلف.
We ___ (underestimate) the opponent at the start.
I wish we ____ (train) harder last week.
They ___ (not / pass) when they had a chance.
We ______ (overestimate) our skills before the match.
